body.name: Home Office Chair Adjustable Height and 360°Swivel Wheels Chairs,Modern Armless Waterproof PU Leather Vanity Chair for Daily Makeup,Reading,Rest Office Chairs,Computer Desk Chair
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 2 hrs 27 mins
features: Premium Comfort and Longevity: Constructed with top-notch materials, this small armless office chair ensures maximum comfort and durability. The high-density, thickened sponge cushion (2.5 inches) provides exceptional resilience, while the high-quality PU leather upholstery offers waterproof protection and breathability through its twill design.

Space-Saving Efficiency: Designed with a space-saving mindset, this small armless office chair boasts adjustable dimensions (24.21"(L) x 16.33"(W) x 34.25"(H)) to seamlessly fit into any office or workspace. The armless design allows easy storage under your desk, maximizing available space when the chair is not in use.

Optimized Ergonomics for Support: Ergonomically designed for optimal comfort and support, this armless office chair features a specially padded foam backrest that provides excellent lumbar support. The U-shaped metal material in the backrest ensures greater stability and durability, enhancing your overall sitting experience.

Sturdy and Reliable Construction: Built to withstand long hours of use, this 360° swivel task chair features a high-quality metal base and upgraded SGS-certified cylinders for durability and reliability. Rigorously tested over 10,000 times and BIFMA certified, this computer desk chair has a maximum weight capacity of 250 pounds, ensuring solid reliability for maximum comfort and safety.

Effortless Assembly Experience: Enjoy a hassle-free assembly with all necessary accessories included in the package. Follow the easy-to-understand instructions consisting of just 6 steps, and your chair will be ready for use in approximately 10 minutes. Experience the convenience of a fully assembled chair without any prolonged setup time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: A bit tedious to put together, but I’m not that great with a screwdriver anyway. It’s a well-made chair and I love it. I needed a replacement for in front of my sewing machine, and this is ideal because I can adjust the height to what I need.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Feels like good material. Easy to build. Rolls so smoothly!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Practical office chair
reviews.reviewText: I really hate assembling things, and when I choose to it’s because I really needed the thing to be assembled. That’s true in this case, and the good news is it wasn’t one of the hard/impossible assembly jobs. To start with, they have a blister pack of all the small parts in individual, well-labeled blisters AND a very handy, actually for me indispensable, L-shaped allen wrench tool. The directions are also very clear and specific. The actual putting together by mostly screwing screws into the designated holes went without a hitch. It was a repetitive task, and getting them in firmly took some effort, but the allen wrench tool gave me just enough leverage to get them tight. There’s also a little blister of extra parts that I’m going to keep with the allen wrench screw, because the directions recommend retightening all the screws after 6 months, and from experience I know that those escape artist screws disappear quickly. I took off one star because I don’t feel real confident about the holding power of some of the material and because the seat wasn’t all that comfortable, although everything works at this time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy assembly, comfortable chair
reviews.reviewText: I really like this chair. It’s comfortable and easy to adjust. The color is really nice and as pictured. The assembly was very easy. All the steps/ pieces were well labeled and the instructions were very easy to follow.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for my home office
reviews.reviewText: I work from home, and I prefer to sit criss-cross while I’m working. I already had a very nice desk chair, but the arms on it prevented me from being able to sit comfortably. This chair is perfect for me. It took me about 20 minutes to put together with the enclosed Allen wrench and instructions. The chair is quite sturdy, and the material is soft and durable. I have the brown chair, and the color is exactly as pictured. I’ve used it for about three or four days now, and I feel like my back is less sore because I can sit in a way that feels better for me. My only wish is that the seat was just a little bit wider, but overall, I am really happy with this desk chair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A most excellent chair
reviews.reviewText: This is surprisingly comfortable for having a short back to it. The size is good for our small office space without feeling like a kid's chair. The rollers work smoothly and the seat is ergonomically shaped for comfort. It went together very easily and the manufacturer had a nifty ribbon attaching the set of hardware and tool for assembly, so they wouldn't get lost. Everything was well thought out, and we are very happy with it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice and simple nothing to fancy
reviews.reviewText: I recently had the pleasure of using the 360 Home Office Chair 360 Swivel Chair in my office, and I must say, it was a great addition! The chair's swivel feature allows for easy maneuverability, making it convenient to move around my workspace without any hassle. The design is sleek and modern, adding a touch of elegance to my office decor. Additionally, the chair is incredibly comfortable, providing ample support for long working hours. Overall, I highly recommend the 360 Home Office Chair 360 Swivel Chair for anyone looking to upgrade their office furniture. It's a nice and practical choice that will enhance your workspace experience. I put a cute white fuzzy blanket over to give a little more glam.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Bit Detailed Assembly but Comfy
reviews.reviewText: This was one of the more in-depth assembly experiences I’ve had w a chair, but with my years of IKEA and whatnot experience, it took about 10 minutes to assemble after it was completely unpacked.The fact it came w extra hardware is nice, plus the included Allen Wrench is cool and easy to use.The chair is comfy, has a nice range of heights, and rolls really well.The pleather may have a bit of a smell to it, but the directions say to air it out a bit. I don’t think it’s a strong overpowering smell, just a bit of a cardboard boxy type smell that ya have to stick your face on the chair basically to smell.It’s unfortunate the back isn’t adjustable though.
